entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
